alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 25 at 2:44PM MDT until July 25 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southeastern Washington County in southwestern Utah... specifically for Hildale, Utah... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 244 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the Hildale area. Between 0.25 and 0.75 inches of rain have fallen within the Short Creek basin. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hildale. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
